title.rendered: 2013 Justice Conference for Aboriginal Youth was the biggest and best ever

content.rendered: The fifth annual Justice Conference for Aboriginal Youth, hosted jointly by the Faculty of Law’s Aboriginal Law Program and the Law in Action Within Schools (LAWS) Program, was held March 22, 2013 and drew a record crowd of 45 students.

excerpt.rendered: The fifth annual Justice Conference for Aboriginal Youth, hosted jointly by the Faculty of Law’s Aboriginal Law Program and the Law in Action Within Schools (LAWS) Program, was held March 22,…
